html:
The questions

These aren't really in any order
Give me all of Taylor's (official) names/aliases. As separate answers.
<q>My brain is just too large</q>

Who has 'minecraft' in their name?
(Like "[first name] Minecraft".)

This question is free! It gives you free points!!! The answer to the question is 'fuck off'. Literally just type that and you're good!!! Don't you dare forget to type a space in between these two words!! If you do there will be consequences!!!
Have some colors:
The answer to this question is in a comment.<!--The answer is 'small kitties are very cute and nice and soft and cuddly' -->

Some very poorly drawn symbols coming up

Just answer with what you think it is or what it is from.
What is this?
Send a GET request to ./dumbQuestion.php with 'duck' set to 'true' for the answer to this question.
What is the equivalent impedance of this circuit at 500Hz? (In Ohms, rounded to full Ohms.)

My comment on this track
Now, you could obviously explore my SoundCloud account with ease, given this link. However, please refrain from doing so, as that shit is cringe af.

And what is this?

Give me a command line command that puts a detailed list of the current directory (including permissions and file sizes) into a file named "dumb_shit.txt".
Make the command as short as possible.
This question is exact.

This question will literally give you negative points.
You will lose a point if you answer this question.
The answer is "Balloon".
What was on this page (jochemleijenhorst.com/quiz) before this quiz was on it?

What did I mean with "I did a Toby Fox" in the answer response on the previous question? Name the website.
(If you didn't get that question, too bad lmao)
I spent way too long on this

Below is a very readable and well-commented C program. You can view the code here, or, if you prefer, you can copy&paste/download it from here to look at it in your favorite code editor. Slight warning though: severe outbursts of anger, frustration and/or headaches are not uncommon when viewing this code. Looking at it hurts my eyes :(
The code

This question is exact.
